name: Seagull Loves a Weapon
description:
This game is a prequel to Incompatible Fusion Machine and will probably make more sense if you play it first, but you don't have to.

Chaika 1671 Seagull needs to get her lover some flowers so the two of them can keep track of humans better. How does that work? I don't know, but neither does Seagull!
Made in less than a week for a jam.
Might require the RPGmaker 2003 RTP to play, I tried to remove all of the RTP from the database but maybe something was left over.
Don't play this if you're under 18, my characters say curse words.
They say a whole lot of them.
